_comment: Rice's Role Rhapsody - English Language File
announcement.goals.avenger: Protect your bound target. If they die, you will gain the power to avenge them!
announcement.goals.conspirator: Guess other players' roles. If correct, they will die in 20 seconds!
announcement.goals.example_killer: Eliminate all passengers without getting caught.
announcement.goals.slippery_ghost: Use your exclusive shop to sabotage other players and win with the killers!
announcement.goals.engineer: Use reinforcements and alarm traps to protect passengers from killers!
announcement.goals.boxer: Use Iron Body skill to counter attackers and protect yourself!
item.noellesroles.conspiracy_page.toolti: Right-click to guess a player's role
item.noellesroles.blank_cartridge.toolti: Right-click on a target to put their gun on 30s cooldown
item.noellesroles.smoke_grenade.tooltip: Throw to create smoke area; direct hit clears target's sanity
item.noellesroles.reinforcement.tooltip: Left-click door to reinforce (blocks one crowbar); Sneak+right-click to unjam
item.noellesroles.alarm_trap.tooltip: Right-click door to place trap; triggers alarm when crowbar is used
message.noellesroles.avenger.bound: You are now protecting %s. If they die, you will gain the power to avenge them!
message.noellesroles.avenger.activated: %s has been killed! Your vengeance has awakened!
message.noellesroles.conspirator.cursed: You feel a mysterious force surrounding you...
message.noellesroles.conspirator.killed: %s has been killed by your conspiracy!
message.noellesroles.conspirator.not_con: Only the Conspirator can use this item!
tip.noellesroles.conspirator.no_target: Use Conspiracy Page to guess player roles
screen.noellesroles.conspirator.title: Book of Conspiracy
screen.noellesroles.conspirator.hint: Press ESC to go back or cancel
message.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.smok: %s was directly hit by smoke grenade, sanity cleared!
tip.noellesroles.slippery_ghost.shop: Press TAB to open Slippery Ghost shop
message.noellesroles.engineer.reinforced: Door reinforced! Can block one crowbar attack.
message.noellesroles.engineer.already_br: This door is broken and cannot be reinforced!
message.noellesroles.engineer.not_engine: Only the Engineer can use this item!
message.noellesroles.engineer.trap_trigg: ALARM! Someone is breaking the door lock!
message.noellesroles.engineer.reinforcem: Reinforcement destroyed by crowbar, but door remains intact!
tip.noellesroles.engineer.shop: Press TAB to open Engineer shop
announcement.goals.postman: Use delivery box to secretly exchange items with players.
item.noellesroles.delivery_box.tooltip: Aim at a player and right-click to open delivery interface
announcement.goals.detective: Spend 200 coins to inspect a player's inventory. If they move, the screen closes!
message.noellesroles.postman.delivery_re: %s wants to deliver items to you
tip.noellesroles.postman.shop: Press TAB to open Postman shop
hud.noellesroles.detective.ready: Inspect Ready! Press G and aim at target
hud.noellesroles.detective.ready_cost: Inspect Ready (200 coins) - Aim at target and press G
screen.noellesroles.postman.title: Secret Delivery
screen.noellesroles.postman.hint: Click slots to place items, confirm when both ready
message.noellesroles.boxer.ability_activ: Iron Body activated! Immune to any death for 1.5s!
message.noellesroles.boxer.counter_succe: Counter successful! %s was repelled by your Iron Body!
message.noellesroles.boxer.counter_knife: Your knife was repelled! Entering cooldown...
announcement.goals.athlete: Use your unlimited stamina and sprint ability to help passengers complete tasks!
message.noellesroles.athlete.ability_act: Sprint activated! Speed boost for 20 seconds!
announcement.goals.stalker: Observe players to gain power. Evolve and hunt them down.
message.noellesroles.stalker.phase2_adva: You have evolved to Phase 2 - Awakened Hunter!
message.noellesroles.stalker.phase3_adva: You have evolved to Phase 3 - Rampaging Pursuer!
message.noellesroles.stalker.phase_regre: Time ran out. Returning to Phase 2.
announcement.goals.admirer: Observe others from the shadows and accumulate your adoration. When your energy overflows, you will transform into a true hunter.
hud.noellesroles.admirer.title: Admirer
hud.noellesroles.admirer.hint: Hold G to gaze and accumulate energy
message.noellesroles.admirer.transform: Your adoration turned into murderous intent... You became %s!
announcement.goals.trapper: Set invisible Calamity Marks on the ground. Players who step on them will be imprisoned and revealed!
hud.noellesroles.trapper.title: Trapper
hud.noellesroles.trapper.ready: Trap Ready - Press G to place
message.noellesroles.trapper.no_ground: Cannot find valid ground to place trap!
message.noellesroles.trapper.trap_trigge: You triggered a Calamity Mark! Imprisoned for %s seconds!
announcement.goals.star: You are the center of attention! Glow every 20 seconds for 2 seconds, use your ability to make nearby players look at you!
hud.noellesroles.star.title: Star
message.noellesroles.star.attracted: ✨ Your gaze is drawn to the Star!
announcement.goals.veteran: You are a veteran soldier. You start with a knife. After killing one person with it, the knife will disappear.
message.noellesroles.veteran.knife_used: Your knife has been used and disappeared!
announcement.goals.singer: You are a singer! Press the ability key to play a random music disc and let everyone nearby hear your song!
hud.noellesroles.singer.title: Singer
announcement.goals.psychologist: When your sanity is full, aim at a player and keep them still for 10 seconds to restore their sanity completely!
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.title: Psychologist
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.ready: Therapy Ready - Press G and aim at target
hud.noellesroles.psychologist.not_ready: Your sanity must be full to heal others
message.noellesroles.psychologist.not_fu: Your sanity must be full to use this ability!
message.noellesroles.psychologist.healin: Started healing %s. Keep them still for 10 seconds!
message.noellesroles.psychologist.being_: %s is healing your mind. Stay still!
announcement.goals.puppeteer: Collect corpses to evolve. After evolution, create puppets from the bodies you collected and control them to hunt!
hud.noellesroles.puppeteer.title: Puppeteer
hud.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ready: Puppet Ready - Press G (%d puppets available)
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.phase2_ad: You have collected enough bodies! You are now a Puppet Master!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ac: Puppet activated! You have %s seconds to hunt!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.puppet_ti: Puppet time expired. Returning to body...
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.body_died: Your body was killed! Game over.
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.shop_bloc: Puppet Master cannot use shop in body mode!
message.noellesroles.puppeteer.ability_c: Puppet ability on cooldown, %s seconds remaining
